name: cpu::id::CpuId::new

util::id_set::Id::new_unchecked.doc:
Creates an ID instance given a raw ID number.

 # Safety

 The given number must be less than `Self::cardinality()`.

core::panicking::panic.doc: The underlying implementation of core's `panic!` macro when no formatting is used.

doc:
Creates a new instance.

 # Panics

 The given number must be smaller than the total number of CPUs
 (`ostd::cpu::num_cpus()`).
